name: Sheeper Charged
description:
Sheeper is taking a walk through town and does not pay attention to his surroundings. Do not let him fall, while he is browsing through is favourite apps.

Keys:

up - jump

down - slide

Made by:

Programming:

Alan Stewart (@ajsgamedev)

Judith Hartmann (@hifiserious)

Art & Animation:

Mackinley Raftery (@Kinley_R_Art)

Music & Sounds
